SEARCH
Package model.cards.PlayableCards

Class PlayableCard

java.lang.Object
model.cards.PlayableCards.PlayableCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, ResourceCard, StarterCard
public abstract class PlayableCard extends Object implements Card
Represents an abstract PlayableCard which defines the basic structure and behavior for all playable cards in the game. This class should be extended by specific types of playable cards.
See Also:
